OPENCTI_URL.description: The base URL of the OpenCTI instance.

OPENCTI_TOKEN.description: The API token to connect to OpenCTI.

CONNECTOR_LOG_LEVEL.description: The minimum level of logs to display.

CONNECTOR_DURATION_PERIOD.description: The period of time to await between two runs of the connector.

MALPEDIA_IMPORT_INTRUSION_SETS.description: Choose if you want to import Intrusion-Sets from Malpedia

MALPEDIA_IMPORT_YARA.description: Choose if you want to import Yara rules from Malpedia

MALPEDIA_CREATE_INDICATORS.description: Choose if you want to create Indicators Sample (File) from Malpedia

MALPEDIA_CREATE_OBSERVABLES.description: Choose if you want to create Observables Sample (File) from Malpedia

MALPEDIA_DEFAULT_MARKING.description: The default TLP marking to apply to entities created by the connector. If not defined, the default when an API key is provided is `TLP:AMBER`, otherwise `TLP:WHITE`.
